article_metadata.author: David Shaywitz

og.description: We have inadequate appreciation for the caregivers and entrepreneurs who recognize and devote their lives to addressing the often profound health needs that few others – not doctors, not regulators, not the patients themselves – feel comfortable discussing.
og.title: High Value But Little Glory: Innovating The Unmentionable
